questions.question: Are all intercom units functioning properly, including audio and video communication features?
Do tenants experience clear and consistent audio/video quality during intercom calls?
Are there any issues with the door release function, such as delays or malfunctions?
Are the entry codes or access control features working as intended for residents and authorized visitors?
Have the intercom system's wiring and connections been inspected for any signs of damage or wear?
Is the main control panel of the intercom system in good condition, with no visible damage or malfunctioning components?
Have any issues with the external doorbell or call buttons been addressed, ensuring they are responsive and reliable?
Are any security features, such as camera surveillance or motion detection, operating correctly?
Have intercom system settings, such as volume levels and call forwarding options, been checked and adjusted if necessary?
Have tenants been informed of any maintenance or troubleshooting procedures for the intercom system, and are they aware of how to report issues?
Have regular maintenance tasks, such as cleaning the intercom units and testing backup power sources, been performed according to schedule?
Are there any signs of vandalism or tampering with the intercom system components?
Have any software updates or firmware upgrades for the intercom system been installed to ensure optimal performance and security?
Are there any issues with intercom communication between different units or between the intercom and management office?
Have intercom system logs or call records been reviewed for any unusual activity or malfunctioning units?
Is the intercom system integrated with other building security systems, such as access control or CCTV cameras, and are they functioning properly?
Have any intercom units that are not working or malfunctioning been identified and scheduled for repair or replacement?
Are intercom system cables and wiring properly organized and secured to prevent tripping hazards or damage?
Have tenants been provided with clear instructions on how to operate the intercom system and troubleshoot common issues?
Are there any physical obstructions or environmental factors, such as extreme temperatures or moisture, that could affect the intercom system's performance?
Have intercom system manuals and documentation been kept up-to-date and readily available for reference?
Are there any issues with the intercom system's power supply, such as voltage fluctuations or power outages?
Have any false alarms or nuisance alerts from the intercom system been investigated and resolved?
Are there any regulatory compliance requirements or industry standards that need to be followed for the maintenance of the intercom system?
Have tenants been surveyed or consulted for feedback on the intercom system's performance and usability, and have any issues raised been addressed appropriately?
